properties.description: This policy defines a allow list of role definitions that can be used in IAM. Optionally provide exempt principal objectIds (users and/or groups) to permit exceptions without generating non-compliance.

metadata.description: The list of approved role definition resource IDs that may be assigned (e.g. /providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/<guid>).

Optional list of Microsoft Entra ID objectIds for exempt principals (users and/or groups). If the role assignment principalId is in this list, the assignment is exempt from the allowed role definition list.
